Prompt.en: Do you know much about Feng Shui?
What is your favorite Chinese tradition?
Prompt.zh: 你最喜欢的中华文化传统是什么？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuān de zhōnghuá wénhuà chuántǒng shì shénme?

Prompt.en: Do you know any famous landmarks in China?
Prompt.zh: 你知道哪些来自中国的风景名胜？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào nǎxiē láizì zhōngguó de fēngjǐng míngshèng?

Prompt.en: What do you know about Yin Yang？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào yīnyáng de yìyì ma?

Prompt.en: What do you think about Chinese medicine?
Prompt.zh: 你对传统中医药有什么看法？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ duì chuántǒng zhōng yīyào yǒu shé me kànfǎ?

Prompt.en: Do you know your own Chinese zodiac?
Prompt.zh: 你知道你自己属于哪个十二生肖吗？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào nǐ zìjǐ shǔyú nǎge shí'èr shēngxiào ma?

Prompt.en: What is your favorite family tradition?
Prompt.zh: 你最不喜欢的家务是什么？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zuì bù xǐhuān de jiāwù shì shénme?

Prompt.en: What is your favorite family tradition?
Prompt.zh: 你最喜欢的家庭传统是什么？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuān de jiātíng chuántǒng shì shénme?

Prompt.en: What one important thing that your parents have taught you?
Prompt.zh: 什么是一个你父母教会你最重要的事情？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Shénme shì yīgè nǐ fùmǔ jiàohuì nǐ zuì zhòngyào de shìqíng?

Prompt.en: Where would you like to travel for your next family vacation?
Prompt.zh: 你的下一次家庭度假想去哪里旅行？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ de xià yīcì jiātíng dùjià xiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng?

Prompt.en: What are some of the famous Chinese dishes that you know?
Prompt.zh: 你知道哪些著名的中国菜肴？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào nǎxiē zhùmíng de zhōngguó càiyáo?

Prompt.en: What is your favorite Chinese festival food?
Prompt.zh: 你最喜欢的中国节日菜肴是什么？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuān de zhōngguó jiérì càiyáo shì shénme?

Prompt.en: Do you have a favourite Chinese food?
Prompt.zh: 你最喜欢的中国美食是什么？
Prompt.zh-pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuān de zhōngguó měishí shì shénme?

Prompt.en: How much can you handle spicy food?
